Test Case Name: User Registration - Valid Email and Password
Test Description: Verify user can register with valid email and password
Preconditions: App is launched and user is on sign up page
Test Steps:
1. Enter valid email address
2. Enter password with minimum 6 characters
3. Confirm password matches
4. Tap Sign Up button
Expected Result: User account is created successfully and navigated to profile creation page

Test Description: Verify registration fails with invalid email format
Preconditions: App is launched and user is on sign up page
Test Steps:
1. Enter invalid email address (e.g., test@)
2. Enter valid password
3. Confirm password
4. Tap Sign Up button
Expected Result: Error message displayed: 'Please enter a valid email'

Test Description: Verify registration fails with password less than 6 characters
Preconditions: App is launched and user is on sign up page
Test Steps:
1. Enter valid email address
2. Enter password with less than 6 characters
3. Confirm password
4. Tap Sign Up button
Expected Result: Error message displayed: 'Password must be at least 6 characters'

Test Description: Verify registration fails when passwords don't match
Preconditions: App is launched and user is on sign up page
Test Steps:
1. Enter valid email address
2. Enter valid password
3. Enter different password in confirm field
4. Tap Sign Up button
Expected Result: Error message displayed: 'Passwords do not match'

Test Description: Verify user can login with valid email and password
Preconditions: User has registered account
Test Steps:
1. Enter valid email address
2. Enter correct password
3. Tap Sign In button
Expected Result: User is logged in and navigated to home page or profile completion

Test Description: Verify login fails with invalid credentials
Preconditions: App is launched and user is on login page
Test Steps:
1. Enter invalid email or password
2. Tap Sign In button
Expected Result: Error message displayed for invalid credentials

Test Description: Verify login fails with empty fields
Preconditions: App is launched and user is on login page
Test Steps:
1. Leave email field empty
2. Leave password field empty
3. Tap Sign In button
Expected Result: Error messages displayed for required fields

Test Description: Verify password visibility can be toggled
Preconditions: User is on login or sign up page
Test Steps:
1. Enter password in password field
2. Tap visibility toggle icon
Expected Result: Password text toggles between visible and hidden

Preconditions: User is on login page
Test Steps: 1. Tap 'Forgot Password?' link
Expected Result: User is navigated to forgot password page

Preconditions: User is logged in and on settings page
Test Steps:
1. Navigate to Settings page
2. Tap Logout option
Expected Result: User is logged out and navigated to login page

Test Description: Verify basic info step in profile creation
Preconditions: User has registered and is on profile creation page
Test Steps:
1. Select age from date picker
2. Select gender (Male/Female/Other)
3. Select seeking gender (Male/Female/Any)
4. Tap Next
Expected Result: Step validation passes and moves to next step

Test Description: Verify location and age preferences step
Preconditions: User is on location step of profile creation
Test Steps:
1. Enter hometown
2. Adjust age range slider
3. Tap Next
Expected Result: Step validation passes and moves to next step

Preconditions: User is on profile details step
Test Steps:
1. Enter bio text
2. Select at least one interest
3. Tap Next
Expected Result: Step validation passes and moves to next step

Preconditions: User is on objectives step
Test Steps:
1. Select at least one objective
2. Tap Save Profile
Expected Result: Profile is saved and user navigated to home page

Test Description: Verify validation errors for incomplete steps
Preconditions: User is on any profile creation step
Test Steps:
1. Try to proceed without filling required fields
2. Tap Next/Save
Expected Result: Error message displayed for missing required fields

Test Description: Verify current profile data loads in edit form
Preconditions: User is logged in and navigates to edit profile
Test Steps:
1. Navigate to Settings > Edit Profile
2. Verify form fields are populated with current data
Expected Result: All form fields display current user data
